trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertySetAccessRule" /> class represents a specific type of access rule that is used to allow or deny access to an Active Directory Domain Services property set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertySetAccessRule" /> 類別代表特定類型的存取規則，用於允許或拒絕對 Active Directory 網域服務屬性集的存取。

trans-unit.source: For a list of property sets that are defined for Active Directory Domain Services, see the topic [Property Sets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/property_sets.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 如需針對 Active Directory 網域服務所定義的屬性集清單，請參閱 MSDN Library ([http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)) 中的＜[屬性集](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/property_sets.asp)＞主題。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertySetAccessRule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertySetAccessRule" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 物件，可識別存取規則的信任項。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 列舉值，可指定存取規則類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertyAccess" /> enumeration values that specifies the property access type.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertyAccess" /> 列舉值，可指定屬性存取類型。

trans-unit.source: The Rights-Guid of the property set that this access rule applies to.
trans-unit.target: 套用了這項存取規則之屬性集的 Rights-Guid。

trans-unit.source: In the Active Directory Domain Services schema documentation, this information can be found in the **Rights-GUID** row on the reference page for each property set.
trans-unit.target: 在 Active Directory 網域服務結構描述文件中，可在每個屬性集之參考頁面上的 [Rights-GUID] 資料列中找到這項資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic Rights-GUID in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library) 中的＜Rights-GUID＞主題。

trans-unit.source: For a list of property sets, see the topic Property Sets in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性集清單，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的＜屬性集＞主題。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertySetAccessRule" /> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, property access type, and property set identifier.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的識別參考、存取控制類型、屬性存取類型和屬性集識別項，初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertySetAccessRule" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 物件，可識別存取規則的信任項。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 列舉值，可指定存取規則類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertyAccess" /> enumeration values that specifies the property access type.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertyAccess" /> 列舉值，可指定屬性存取類型。

trans-unit.source: The Rights-Guid of the property set that this access rule applies to.
trans-unit.target: 套用了這項存取規則之屬性集的 Rights-Guid。

trans-unit.source: In the Active Directory Domain Services schema documentation, this information can be found in the **Rights-GUID** row on the reference page for each property set.
trans-unit.target: 在 Active Directory 網域服務結構描述文件中，可在每個屬性集之參考頁面上的 [Rights-GUID] 資料列中找到這項資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic Rights-GUID in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library) 中的＜Rights-GUID＞主題。

trans-unit.source: For a list of property sets, see the topic Property Sets in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性集清單，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的＜屬性集＞主題。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> 列舉值，可指定存取規則的繼承類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertySetAccessRule" /> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, property access type, property set identifier, and Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的識別參考、存取控制類型、屬性存取類型、屬性集識別項和 Active Directory 網域服務安全性繼承資訊，初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertySetAccessRule" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 物件，可識別存取規則的信任項。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 列舉值，可指定存取規則類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertyAccess" /> enumeration values that specifies the property access type.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertyAccess" /> 列舉值，可指定屬性存取類型。

trans-unit.source: The Rights-Guid of the property set that this access rule applies to.
trans-unit.target: 套用了這項存取規則之屬性集的 Rights-Guid。

trans-unit.source: In the Active Directory Domain Services schema documentation, this information can be found in the **Rights-GUID** row on the reference page for each property set.
trans-unit.target: 在 Active Directory 網域服務結構描述文件中，可在每個屬性集之參考頁面上的 [Rights-GUID] 資料列中找到這項資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic Rights-GUID in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library) 中的＜Rights-GUID＞主題。

trans-unit.source: For a list of property sets, see the topic Property Sets in the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性集清單，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的＜屬性集＞主題。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> 列舉值，可指定存取規則的繼承類型。

trans-unit.source: The schema GUID of the child object type that can inherit this access rule.
trans-unit.target: 可繼承此存取規則之子物件類型的結構描述 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertySetAccessRule" /> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, property access type, property set identifier, inheritance type, and inherited object type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的識別參考、存取控制類型、屬性存取類型、屬性集識別項、繼承類型和繼承的物件類型，初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertySetAccessRule" /> 類別的新執行個體。
